title: JSX cli -- ES6 Class getter setter support?
body:
When I run:

```
jsx --harmony --strip-types ./src ./lib
```

The following error is thrown:

```
Error while reading module ValidationResult:
Error: This transform does not support getter methods for ES6 classes. (line: 37, col: 2)
    at Array.visitClassMethod (/home/miles/.nvm/v0.11.13/lib/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/jstransform/visitors/es6-class-visitors.js:147:11)
    at walker (/home/miles/.nvm/v0.11.13/lib/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/jstransform/src/jstransform.js:204:25)
    at Object.analyzeAndTraverse (/home/miles/.nvm/v0.11.13/lib/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/jstransform/src/utils.js:474:9)
    at traverse (/home/miles/.nvm/v0.11.13/lib/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/jstransform/src/jstransform.js:145:9)
    at traverser (/home/miles/.nvm/v0.11.13/lib/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/jstransform/src/jstransform.js:141:5)
    at /home/miles/.nvm/v0.11.13/lib/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/jstransform/src/utils.js:481:5
    at Array.forEach (native)
    at Object.analyzeAndTraverse (/home/miles/.nvm/v0.11.13/lib/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/jstransform/src/utils.js:480:28)
    at traverse (/home/miles/.nvm/v0.11.13/lib/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/jstransform/src/jstransform.js:145:9)
    at _renderClassBody (/home/miles/.nvm/v0.11.13/lib/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/jstransform/visitors/es6-class-visitors.js:375:3)
From previous event:
    at buildP (/home/miles/.nvm/v0.11.13/lib/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/commoner/lib/reader.js:159:16)
    at /home/miles/.nvm/v0.11.13/lib/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/commoner/lib/reader.js:187:28
Error: This transform does not support getter methods for ES6 classes. (line: 37, col: 2)
    at Array.visitClassMethod (/home/miles/.nvm/v0.11.13/lib/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/jstransform/visitors/es6-class-visitors.js:147:11)
    at walker (/home/miles/.nvm/v0.11.13/lib/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/jstransform/src/jstransform.js:204:25)
    at Object.analyzeAndTraverse (/home/miles/.nvm/v0.11.13/lib/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/jstransform/src/utils.js:474:9)
    at traverse (/home/miles/.nvm/v0.11.13/lib/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/jstransform/src/jstransform.js:145:9)
    at traverser (/home/miles/.nvm/v0.11.13/lib/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/jstransform/src/jstransform.js:141:5)
    at /home/miles/.nvm/v0.11.13/lib/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/jstransform/src/utils.js:481:5
    at Array.forEach (native)
    at Object.analyzeAndTraverse (/home/miles/.nvm/v0.11.13/lib/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/jstransform/src/utils.js:480:28)
    at traverse (/home/miles/.nvm/v0.11.13/lib/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/jstransform/src/jstransform.js:145:9)
    at _renderClassBody (/home/miles/.nvm/v0.11.13/lib/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/jstransform/visitors/es6-class-visitors.js:375:3)
From previous event:
    at buildP (/home/miles/.nvm/v0.11.13/lib/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/commoner/lib/reader.js:159:16)
    at /home/miles/.nvm/v0.11.13/lib/node_modules/react-tools/node_modules/commoner/lib/reader.js:187:28
```

I'm trying to use a library called `react-forms` in an isomorphic app, which needs server-side rendering. The module works fine client-side, but the JSX/ES6 isn't playing nice on the server even though the server's already set up to render React components and other JSX code. As stated [here](https://github.com/prometheusresearch/react-forms/issues/77#issuecomment-69050056), it seems there's a transformation supported in `reactify` (via its `--target es5` flag) which isn't supported in `react-tools`. I say "_seems_" because I have a hard time believing `react-tools` can't do the same thing. What am I missing?
